summaries.title: Neryl East: Some of the biggest brands sprinted to bottom of reputation heap in 2025
summaries.summary: In 2025, several major brands faced significant reputational damage due to various scandals, including Optus's mishandling of emergency services, Qantas's customer data breach on the dark web, and Deloitte's controversial AI practices. These incidents contributed to a notable decline in public trust for these companies.

summaries.title: ‘The Copenhagen Test’ Cast: Meet the Stars From Simu Liu to Melissa Barrera
summaries.summary: The article highlights the cast of the high-stakes thriller "The Copenhagen Test," featuring breakout lead Simu Liu and scene-stealer Melissa Barrera among other talented actors. The ensemble is noted for their ability to bring the film's intense narrative to life.

summaries.title: Tech Guru meetup ’25 ignites innovation; showcases the Future of African Tech
summaries.summary: The second edition of the Tech Guru Meetup, organized by Tech Hub Africa, took place in Accra, bringing together Ghana's digital community, including students, professionals, startup founders, and investors. The event focused on fostering innovation, collaboration, and networking, highlighting the future of technology in Africa.

summaries.title: Is your child’s screen affecting their sleep? The hidden cost of screens in the bedroom
summaries.summary: The article discusses the impact of screens on children's sleep and overall well-being, highlighting concerns within a local school district. It emphasizes the need for strategies to help students thrive in a technology-driven environment while addressing the hidden costs of screen use in the bedroom.

summaries.title: Ticker: Judge OKs Trump’s $100K visa
summaries.summary: A federal judge has approved the Trump administration's implementation of a $100,000 fee on new H-1B visa applications. This decision poses a challenge for U.S. technology companies that depend on hiring skilled foreign workers.

summaries.title: Senior doctors felicitated at IMA NATCON 2025
summaries.summary: Senior doctors were honored at the IMA NATCON 2025 event, recognizing their contributions to the medical field. The event celebrated their achievements and dedication to healthcare, highlighting the importance of their work in improving patient outcomes and advancing medical practices.

summaries.title: Bryant knocks off Worcester State 95-59
summaries.summary: The Bryant Bulldogs secured a decisive 95-59 victory over the Worcester State Lancers, with Keegan Harvey leading the team with 21 points. This win brings Bryant's season record to 4-10.

summaries.title: Engineering Expert Applauds Mahama’s Big Push Initiative, Calls for Stronger Safety and Sustainability Measures
summaries.summary: A senior engineering expert, Engr. Surv. Dr. Ebenezer Gyamera, has praised President John Mahama for the Big Push Initiative, highlighting its significant investment in road and infrastructure development across the nation. In a press statement, he emphasized the need for enhanced safety and sustainability measures to accompany these transformative projects.

summaries.title: Waste To Energy Market In 2029
summaries.summary: The Waste to Energy market is projected to exceed $55 billion by 2029, highlighting significant growth in this sector. In comparison, the Power Generation market, which encompasses Waste to Energy, is also expected to expand during the same period.

summaries.title: The DIY Fix To Stop Mice From Invading Your Home This Winter
summaries.summary: As winter approaches, mice seek warmth in homes, prompting the need for effective DIY solutions to prevent their invasion. The article suggests various methods to seal entry points and deter rodents, ensuring a cozy and pest-free environment during the colder months.

summaries.title: Bernie Sanders Repeats Call For Data Center Moratorium In Pushback Against ‘Oligarchs’
summaries.summary: Senator Bernie Sanders has reiterated his demand for a moratorium on the construction of AI data centers, criticizing billionaires for their influence and urging them to adopt progressive policies. His comments reflect ongoing concerns about the impact of AI and the concentration of wealth among the elite.

summaries.title: Ethereum + DBTC DeFi in 2026: Daily Returns of $8,000
summaries.summary: In 2026, Ethereum (ETH) continues to play a pivotal role in the blockchain landscape, facilitating decentralized applications and smart contracts. As the network evolves, users are looking for easier methods to earn from Ethereum, with potential daily returns reaching $8,000 through decentralized finance (DeFi) strategies.

summaries.title: Why a New $3 Million Bet on Pathward Stock Signals Confidence in a Bank Posting $7.87 EPS
summaries.summary: Pathward has attracted a new $3 million investment, signaling growing confidence in the bank's performance, which reported an impressive $7.87 EPS. Following a year of consistent execution and profitability, Pathward is evolving from a niche lender to a scalable earnings powerhouse.

summaries.title: Former IBM CEO Louis Gerstner, who revitalized ‘Big Blue,’ dead at 83
summaries.summary: Louis Gerstner, the former CEO and chairman of IBM, passed away at the age of 83 on Saturday. He is remembered for revitalizing the company during his tenure, significantly transforming its operations and culture.

summaries.title: Deutsche Telekom AG (OTCMKTS:DTEGY) Sees Large Growth in Short Interest
summaries.summary: Deutsche Telekom AG (OTCMKTS:DTEGY) experienced a substantial rise in short interest in December, with a total of 360,829 shares shorted as of December 15, marking a 98.5% increase from 181,818 shares on November 30. This surge occurred against an average daily trading volume of 1,155,584 shares.
